Subject: Re: Renewal for Deep Freeze- early renewal discount- May 31st- deadline
Body:
Good morning Nikki and Arthur

We haven't received your Deep Freeze Cloud Ultimate, AV Cloud and MDM
Cloud + TAM
( Dedicated Technical Account Manager service ) renewal order yet and May
31st is the deadline to take advantage of the early renewal discount that
we have offered you.

Please see attached a copy of the direct quote that was sent out to Nikki
on  1 and 3 year options  . Quote is valid until  May 31st.

Also two of our partners provided you with quotes too.

Where are you at decision and order processing? What is your PO status? How
can we assist you?

To secure the discount we need to receive your PO directly by max 4.30 pm
PST May 31st or to send your PO through one of our partners ( SHI or
 Technology Integration Group) by May 30th so we can receive Faronics PO on
time by May 31st for order processing.

Look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best Regards

Shaz
Shaz Salamian

Account Manager/ Chargée de Comptes
Faronics
Toll Free: 800-943-6422 X 4035
Direct:408-471-5842
Toll Free Fax: 800-943-6488

Subject: Re: Renewal for Deep Freeze Question
Body:
Hi Arthur

You used to  have Deep Freeze Enterprise on premise product with
Maintenance but you switched to DF Cloud Ultimate  which is a cloud
subscription service .

You don't need to renew the Maintenance . You will renew Deep Freeze Cloud
Ultimate, AV Cloud and MDM Cloud + TAM service.

Did I answer your question?

Best Regards

Shaz

Attachment: 

Subject: Re: Faronics Cloud services, license counts and early renewal-
Body:
Good morning Arthur and Dean

Received today a renewal quote request form SHI ( Mark_Brum@shi.com)  .
Glad that we know who is now your current SHI  whom we  will send you
through the renewal quote.

You will receive a  quote for a total of 1165 licences to cover 165 extra
deployment counts  on DF Cloud Ultimate and AV cloud + 100 MDM licences on
1, 3 and 5 year options with extra early renewal discounts in case you can
take advantage of it . Also we will quote you on MK's service for one more
year.

Thank you for your support and once you receive the SHI quote, please feel
free to reach out if you have any questions on the quote  or need any
revision .

Best Regards

Shaz

Good morning Arthur and Dean

Received today a renewal quote request form SHI ( Mark_Brum@shi.com)  .
Glad that we know who is now your current SHI  whom we  will send you
through the renewal quote.

You will receive a  quote for a total of 1165 licences to cover 165 extra
deployment counts  on DF Cloud Ultimate and AV cloud + 100 MDM licences on
1, 3 and 5 year options with extra early renewal discounts in case you can
take advantage of it . Also we will quote you on MK's service for one more
year.

Thank you for your support and once you receive the SHI quote, please feel
free to reach out if you have any questions on the quote  or need any
revision .

Best Regards

Shaz

Additional To: arthur.louie@librarieshawaii.org; nicole.viray@librarieshawaii.org
CC: shaz@faronics.com
BCC: 
Attachment: Hawaii State Public Library System_Direct- DF Cloud Ultimate  Revised Quote- May purchase.pdf

Subject: Re: Renewal for Deep Freeze- early renewal discount- May 31st- deadline
Body:
Good morning Nikki and Arthur

We haven't received your Deep Freeze Cloud Ultimate, AV Cloud and MDM
Cloud + TAM
( Dedicated Technical Account Manager service ) renewal order yet and May
31st is the deadline to take advantage of the early renewal discount that
we have offered you.

Please see attached a copy of the direct quote that was sent out to Nikki
on  1 and 3 year options  . Quote is valid until  May 31st.

Also two of our partners provided you with quotes too.

Where are you at decision and order processing? What is your PO status? How
can we assist you?

To secure the discount we need to receive your PO directly by max 4.30 pm
PST May 31st or to send your PO through one of our partners ( SHI or
 Technology Integration Group) by May 30th so we can receive Faronics PO on
time by May 31st for order processing.

Look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best Regards

Shaz

Ultimate, AV Cloud and MDM Cloud + TAM service.

Subject: Re: Faronics Cloud services, license counts and early renewal-
Body:
Good morning Arthur and Dean

Received today a renewal quote request form SHI ( Mark_Brum@shi.com)  .
Glad that we know who is now your current SHI  whom we  will send you
through the renewal quote.

You will receive a  quote for a total of 1165 licences to cover 165 extra
deployment counts  on DF Cloud Ultimate and AV cloud + 100 MDM licences on
1, 3 and 5 year options with extra early renewal discounts in case you can
take advantage of it . Also we will quote you on MK's service for one more
year.

Thank you for your support and once you receive the SHI quote, please feel
free to reach out if you have any questions on the quote  or need any
revision .

Best Regards

Shaz

Subject: Re: Faronics Cloud services, license counts and early renewal-
Body:
Good morning Arthur and Dean

Received today a renewal quote request form SHI ( Mark_Brum@shi.com)  .
Glad that we know who is now your current SHI  whom we  will send you
through the renewal quote.

You will receive a  quote for a total of 1165 licences to cover 165 extra
deployment counts  on DF Cloud Ultimate and AV cloud + 100 MDM licences on
1, 3 and 5 year options with extra early renewal discounts in case you can
take advantage of it . Also we will quote you on MK's service for one more
year.

Thank you for your support and once you receive the SHI quote, please feel
free to reach out if you have any questions on the quote  or need any
revision .

Best Regards

Shaz
